content: unique uneek hat & fingerless mitts by aimee pelletier and carly stipe we ve divided up the yarn and played with the stripes join the fun instructions materials begin by dividing up the ball into halves label balls a and b the striping of this hat is up to you choose to knit 2 yarn 1 skein urth uneek worsted rounds of each ball or one round of each ball both make a 220yds/100g makes 4 mitts or hat playful colorful surprise color shown in color 4007 above 4009 single stripe slouchy hat on second page hat cast on 72 84 stitches with ball a and smaller needle needles us6 & 7 needles 16 circular and place a beginning of the round maker and begin working a double points or 32 for magic loop 1-3 2x2 rib in the round depending on whether you are knitting the folded brim beanie or the slouchy hat notions remember the stripe sequence is up to you stitch markers tapestry needle folded brim beanie our sample hat is worked 2 rounds of each ball a & b size hat - child & adult work a 2x2 rib k2 p2 for 3 inches change to larger fingerless mitts - average needle continue knitting until hat measures 4 5 5 5 from the end of ribbing finish hat by working crown gauge decrease beginning with round 1 20 stitches x 26 row = 4 in stockinette stitch slouchy abbreviations our sample of this hat is worked everyother round of each ball a & b work a 2x2 rib k2 p2 for 1 inch change to k=knit larger needle work an increase round as follows *k5 kfb p = purl repeat from * to end of round 84 98 stitches continue pm = place marker knitting until hat measures 6 5 7 5 from the end of sm = slip marker ribbing finish hat by working the crown decrease k2tog = knit 2 stitches together 1 stitch beginning with round 11 decrease kfb=knit front and back of stitch 1 stitch crown decrease increase round 1 *k10 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 2 knit all stitches and all following even rounds ©2018 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting emailing this pattern to others or darnknitanyway com posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited 651 342 1386 unique uneek hat & fingerless mitts page 2 crown decrease continued round 3 *k9 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 5 *k8 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 7 *k7 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 9 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 11 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 13 *k4 k2tog repeat
